item.title: Student Loan Debt and Housing Crisis Slamming Young People
item.description: Student Loan Debt and Housing Crisis Slamming Young People Young people in the United States are facing a double whammy of high student loan debt and rising housing prices. The average student loan debt for a college graduate is now over $30,000, and the median home price is now over $400,000.
